mapper.insert: insert into FcubeQuestPageView (Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, NickName, Sex, AgeDate, Email, ForutonaAgree, PrivateAgree, PositionAgree, MartketingAgree, AgeLimitAgree ) values (#{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cubeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{influence,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{placeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{influenceReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cubePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasPassword,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeScope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{influenceLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubeHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeLikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeDisLikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{joinPlayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maximumPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starPoints,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expGiveFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{makeExp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ageDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forutonaAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{privateAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{positionAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{martketingAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ageLimitAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.select: select Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, NickName, Sex, AgeDate, Email, ForutonaAgree, PrivateAgree, PositionAgree, MartketingAgree, AgeLimitAgree from FcubeQuestPageView

select Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, NickName, Sex, AgeDate, Email, ForutonaAgree, PrivateAgree, PositionAgree, MartketingAgree, AgeLimitAgree from FcubeQuestPageView
MATCH (CubeName) AGAINST ('*${searchtext}*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
NickName LIKE CONCAT(#{searchtext},'%')
MATCH (CubeName) AGAINST ('*${searchtext}*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
ORDER BY ${sortBy}
desc
asc
Limit #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

select count(*) from FcubeQuestPageView
MATCH (CubeName) AGAINST ('*${searchtext}*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
NickName LIKE CONCAT(#{searchtext},'%')
MATCH (CubeName) AGAINST ('*${searchtext}*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)
